title: Twilight and Other Stories
description: Set in and around contemporary Jerusalem, Shulamith Hareven's Twilight and Other Stories is a mesmerizing collection, bringing readers into the lives and worlds of her characters.“Haraven once again uses her creative skill to craft these troubling, almost surreal stories . . . whose psychological insight and imaginative prose make them both engrossing and haunting.” — Molly Abramowitz, Library Journal
author: Shulamith Hareven
